Uses of Class
net.kuujo.copycat.raft.Member

  • Packages that use Member 
    Package Description
    net.kuujo.copycat.raft
    This package provides base interfaces for Copycat's implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm.
    net.kuujo.copycat.raft.protocol
    The protocol layer provides a set of interfaces for communicating between Raft clients and servers in a Raft cluster.
    net.kuujo.copycat.raft.server
